channel.title: Subtitle torrent test feed
channel.description: contains items for testing videos with subtitles in directory or embedded (mkv)

item.title: Big Buck Bunny ogv with multi language subtitles
item.description: This is the Big Buck Bunny video (.ogv) with various subtitle (en, fr, de) files included in the directory.

item.title: subtitle_test01
item.description: This is a torrent dir that contains the same video file in various format. There is 1 subtitle file that matches all the items.

item.title: subtitle_test02
item.description: This is a torrent dir that contains 1 video file and one .srt file. The .srt file specifies some formatting that the subtitle should display.

item.title: Matrik mkv with subtitles (from videolan)
item.description: This is an .mkv file from videolan.org that contains embedded subtitles.
